title: G1btc
author: G1btc
content: Hello everyone,Few months ago I've published an Android app 'Share link' on play store for few country's people(due to some restrictions in app) and their Bitcointalk topic is below link-https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412438.msg60886777#msg60886777But now I've upgraded the app for everyone.Now anyone can use the app.The app will help users to share their links (New website links,New published Playstore apps links,Referral links etc).User can also earn some revenue by watching ads and links.All earn can be exchange (Withdraw)  to  Dogecoin or Paytm Inr. All the services are totally free and ads based.App Playstore link -https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.share.linkFor other details visit app blogs link-https://addlinks4share.blogspot.com/

comments.author: G1btc
comments.body: I've updated the application.Now everyday can be added upto 3 links.Soon there i will start my new contest.If you not downloaded yet.Go to Playstore for download now-https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.share.link

comments.author: roksana.hee

All the services are totally free and ads based.App Playstore link -https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.share.linkFor other details visit app blogs link-https://addlinks4share.blogspot.com/How will it benefit the people?

comments.author: G1btc
comments.body: Quote from: roksana.hee on April 19, 2023, 05:24:29 AMQuote from: G1btc on February 19, 2023, 06:21:13 AMHello everyone,Few months ago I've published an Android app 'Share link' on play store for few country's people(due to some restrictions in app) and their Bitcointalk topic is below link-https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412438.msg60886777#msg60886777But now I've upgraded the app for everyone.Now anyone can use the app.The app will help users to share their links (New website links,New published Playstore apps links,Referral links etc).User can also earn some revenue by watching ads and links.All earn can be exchange (Withdraw)  to  Dogecoin or Paytm Inr. All the services are totally free and ads based.App Playstore link -https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.share.linkFor other details visit app blogs link-https://addlinks4share.blogspot.com/How will it benefit the people?There are multiple benefits for users(people).Few are below-*  User can add their any links such as an affiliate link, Playstore or Any store app link, YouTube channel or video link etc with free way.They can add their unlimited links (but there are a limit for single day).*  User can find their interesting sites ,apps, video  etc by watching links and also earn points for playing spinwheel game for win rewards.*  App is also a best option for those people who are interesting to earn from faucet sites because App tasks are very simple than a faucet site and earn are bigger than faucet sites.Thank u for asking question..
